title: Where to find LOL tournaments?
body: Hi, So I made a team willing to play competitive LOL tournaments however we are struggling to find any tournaments to participate in, I know there are some 1v1 tournaments that pop up every now and again and there is the OOL. I was wondering if someone could link me or tell me where I can find 5v5 LOL tournaments. Thank you.

replies.body:
Hey!,

You can try checking our events portal - http://events.oce.leagueoflegends.com/

Or you can look to join some of our bigger communities. For example Summoners Society run events regularly - https://www.facebook.com/groups/SummonersSocietyOCE/

Hey Brewski63,

We actually wrote an article about it. Hope it helps! https://www.summoners-society.com/tournaments-places-to-find-them/

As Maraudaur said we run 3 every month! :) hopefully more soon!
You can also find some LoL tournaments on http://battlefy.com
